"Ah, <%me>.": "Impeccable timing as always."
"Have you anything to report on how Aina has been faring lately?"
"She's the same as she's always been."
"She seems less energetic."
"...I see. Well, I certainly hope so."
"As I thought, she's still hesitant to the idea..."

"I think I already mentioned this, but I'm having Aina
act as the instructor for a newly formed team of trainees."
"This will be her first time being the teacher rather than the student."
"She likely feels no small amount of anxiety about the situation."
"Currently, I planned to supervise the training drills myself, but..."
"Aina would feel better if you were supervising."
"Can you keep an eye on Aina?"
"Of course. I'll support her to the best of my abilities."
"Of course. She'll be in my care."

"In response to the threat of the Starless, the Combat
Division has been receiving a lot of applications lately."
"To the point that we're running out of instructors to train them."
"That's why I couldn't be more thankful to count Aina among their number."
"She has the ability to inspire people."
"Not to mention the experience of countless battles."
"I believe Aina would make a good leader."

"Not too long ago she struggled to even operate
a Rifle. Her progress is genuinely astonishing."

"It is that experience of hers that I would like to
see instilled in the next generation of ARKS."
"At any rate, we'll have to wait and see how things go from here."
"I would also like you to inform me of anything notable in that regard."
